slogan: Freesewing is an open source platform for made-to-measure sewing patterns
thankYouForAgreeingToBeAPatron: Thank you for agreeing to be a Patron of Freesewing.
thankYouForGivingFreesewingAChance: Thank you for giving Freesewing a chance.
thankYouNowConfirmLink: Thank you for signing up at freesewing.org. Before we get started, you need to confirm your E-mail address. Just click the link below:
txt-patron2-1: On behalf of myself and the entire freesewing community, I would like to express my gratitude and appreciation that you have made this generous commitment.
txt-patron2-2: First and foremost, we are going to continue doing what we do. I think it is fair to assume that as our Patron, this is what you expect from us. If that makes you feel like you have made no difference, let me assure you: That is not the case.
txt-patron2-3: Your commitment as a Patron is a great motivator for us. It tells us that what we do is worthwhile, and it is helps us secure a sustainable future for freesewing.org, our code, our patterns, and our community.
txt-patron2-4: It is this, somewhat nebulous, dimension to your patronage which matters most. Becoming a Patron of Freesewing was an act of kindness and generosity on your behalf for which we can only offer our gratitude. We coudn't possibly repay you.
txt-patron2-ps: PS: If you are on Twitter, Instagram, or GitHub, please let me know so we can follow you from the official freesewing acccount. It's a patron's priviledge üôÇ
txt-patron4-1: Thank you so much for joining the freesewing patrons as a First Mate. This is great news!
txt-patron4-2: I'll be sending your gift in the mail soon, but before doing so I'll reach out to you to double-check your shipping address.
txt-patron4-3: Meanwhile, I've already added you to our list of patrons on freesewing.org.
txt-patron8-1: Thank you so much for joining the freesewing patrons, as a Captain no less! This is great news.
whyCommentReply: You received this E-mail because somebody replied to one of your comments on freesewing.org.
whyEmailChange: You received this E-mail because you changed the E-mail address associated with your account on freesewing.org
whyGoodbye: You received this E-mail as a final farewell after you removed your account on freesewing.org.
whyPatron: You received this E-mail because you just became a Patron of freesewing.org
whyProfileComment: You received this E-mail because somebody commented on your profile page on freesewing.org.
whyRecover: You receieved this E-mail because we received a password reset request for the freesewing.org account linked to this E-mail address.
whySignup: You received this E-mail because you just signed up for an account on freesewing.org
